mentions.context: (iii) Deep Learning Important FeaTures (DeepLIFT/DL) (Shrikumar et al., 2017): This aims to explain the difference in the output from a reference output in terms of the difference of the input and a reference input.
An all zero embedding vector is used as the baseline input for both Integrated Gradients and DeepLIFT.
